plot: A compilation of "found footage" which repeats itself in odd patterns accompanied by an even crazier soundtrack. The film takes the viewer on an auditory and visual tour of Miron's crazy cinematic mind!
title: The Evil Surprise
plot_es: A compilation of "found footage" which repeats itself in odd patterns accompanied by an even crazier soundtrack. The film takes the viewer on an auditory and visual tour of Miron's crazy cinematic mind!
